body.name: Amazon Essentials Women's Lightweight Water-Resistant Sherpa-Lined Hooded Puffer
features: REGULAR FIT: Close but comfortable fit through chest, waist, and hips.
SHERPA LINED QUILTED PUFFER: Midweight quilted puffer lined with a soft, cozy, midweight sherpa fleece delivers exceptional warmth for those chilly days.

COLD-WEATHER STYLING: This cozy sherpa fleece lined puffer jacket brings ultimate comfort and warmth for those colder winter months. Featuring a feminine, onion quilting pattern, this coat is as warm as it is stylish.

DETAILS: Front zipper closure, split kangaroo front pockets to hold your phone or keys, hood with adjustable bungee cord and toggle to keep in warmth, and internal ribbed sleeve-cuffs for added warmth and comfort.
body.description: Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort. productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #2,147 in Our Brands (See Top 100 in Our Brands) #22 in Women's Down Jackets & Parkas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get it! You won’t be disappointed!
reviews.reviewText: Nice & warm! This coat is good quality & exceeded my expectations! It is long enough to cover my bootie, has inner wrist cuffs & a soft liner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice fall jacket
reviews.reviewText: I have to say I’ve never purchased an Amazon item of clothing. I am pleasantly surprised in the quality of this jacket. It’s lightweight but warm for cool weather. The lining on the body and hood is butter soft. The sleeves are a bit long, but the cuffs hold them up so they stay at wrist level. The back is a tad bit longer to cover and not go up if you bend over. Nice purchase at reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, cozy and warm
reviews.reviewText: The title of my review sums up this jacket. I love the look and color of the jacket and the furry inside makes the jacket very warm. I was able to wear very lightweight clothing underneath and still be plenty warm, even in single digit temperatures. I like that the sleeves don’t have the fuzzy lining - it is a more slick fabric which makes it so much easier to put on and take off the jacket while wearing long sleeve shirts. I also appreciated the cuff at the end of the sleeve which helped keep the warmth in the sleeves. The jacket definitely doesn’t pack down like a less bulky down jacket, but it is light enough that I just wound it through the bungee cords on my backpack to carry it if I wasn’t wearing it. Sizing seems to be spot on. XL is what I normally wear and the XL fit perfectly. I ordered the XXL to try on too and it definitely looked baggy and less cute/fitted. If you want to wear bulky clothes like sweaters underneath, you may need to go up a size so the sleeves can accommodate that, but I found the jacket to be so warm that I never wanted more than a lightweight shirt underneath.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Warm and pretty
reviews.reviewText: Bought XX-Large and it fits me well. (5'2, 190 lbs) This coat just looks nice on you. The fit is flattering. I ordered the navy blue and the color is nice but my favorite thing is how big the pockets are. A lot of coats have small pockets and your gloves always fall out, but this one has nice big pockets to keep your hands toasty and stuff won't fall out of them. The hood is perfect too. Zipper seems sturdy. One thing though, is that I washed it once and I did notice a couple of snags so next time I will turn it inside out when I wash it. But i love it and it was a great sale price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cozy and warm jacket!
reviews.reviewText: I love this jacket so much I bought it twice. The first one I bought in my usual size and was surprised because it felt slightly too big, so I bought it again - without returning the first one - in a size down. That one fit better, but I love them both so much I am not returning the big one! I'm just going to use the bigger one for working in the yard or mucking about around the house or when it is super cold and I want to layer a bunch underneath. The one that fits a little more tailored I'll wear out when I want to look a little more put together or when it is warmer and I don't need to layer as much underneath. This jacket feels very well made, it's super comfortable and warm. It's not as loud as other puffer jackets, which I really like a lot. The zippers are quality. The sherpa-style warm lining has not come off on my clothes. Also I am able to slip it off and on over my Columbia and other brands of zippered fleece jackets with no problems. It goes on and off smoothly without any tugging or issues. I love the pockets and I especially love the sleeves and the cuff part at the wrist. The hood is great and doesn't come down over my face. I washed them both in cold and dried on low in the dryer and there were no issues. They are soft and warm and really just great jackets. I bought the ones that says they are navy with pink flowers, but to me is looks more like black or maybe a very dark navy with fall or autumn leaves or something... whatever it is, it's super cute! :) It's nice to have a jacket that isn't boring basic black like all my other ones but also isn't a bright bold color. I've tried white jackets in the past but they always start looking dingy or dirty after awhile. So this one with the cute botanical pattern is lovely and a refreshing change. I'm very happy with my purchase and might try to buy some more as gifts for friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warmer that expected!
reviews.reviewText: I got this coat in an XL (same as my women's shirt size, I wear a L in unisex sizing). I love it! Not bulky. Much warmer than expected. Current temp is 20°F and it's perfect. Hidden cuffs around wrists. Super soft lining though hood & body, slick lining inside sleeves. Would definitely buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This coat is really warm!
reviews.reviewText: I bought an XL Navy jacket. Really like the zip up, the furry lined deep pockets, the filling without being too fluffy, and a nice large hood. It's a surprise of a great value and a jacket I am sure to wear for many years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
reviews.reviewText: I really like the design of this jacket. The detail in the stitching is a great alternative to just straight lines. I also really like the cuff on the sleeves - very comfortable. The fit is nice, not too bulky in the shoulders and sleeves. However, I want a jacket that looks good on me when zipped up and this is not it. The pockets have the same fuzzy lining as the front body of the jacket so when zipped- there’s a triple layer of thick fluff in the pocket/front and it adds too much bulk on me and looks pretty bad. Two layers of fluffy lining in the pockets and a layer of fluffy lining in the jacket body is not flattering.
Excelente es muy abrigadora y comida

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lovely jacket nicely designed just warm enough for spring.

Ce produit est chaud surtout par ce temps hivernal ! Bien confortable avec la fourrure dans les grandes poches (mon tél. ne tombe pas en ballade) et la capuche est bienvenue. s’il pleut pas de souci !
